refnamediv.refpurpose: Outputs sound from a given fluidEngine

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Outputs the sound from a fluidEngine.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ienginenum -- engine number assigned from fluidEngine

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Invoke fluidOut in an instrument definition numbered higher than any fluidcontrol instrument definitions. All SoundFonts used in the fluidEngine numbered ienginenum send their audio output to this one opcode. Send a note with an indefinite duration to this instrument to turn the SoundFonts on for as long as required.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the fluidOut opcode with two fluidOuts. It uses the file fluidOut.csd, 01hpschd.sf2 and 22Bassoon.sf2.
Example of the fluidOut opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
The output should include lines like these:
chnl 1 using instr 1 chnl 2 using instr 2
SoundFont: 1 Bank: 0 Preset: 0 Harpsichord I-8 SoundFont: 1 Bank: 0 Preset: 70 Ethan Bassoon mono

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: More information on soundfonts is in the Floss Manuals: https://flossmanual.csound.com/midi/reading-midi-files
For other information on soundfonts look in the Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soundfont

refsect1.title: Credits
refsect1.para: Michael Gogins (gogins at pipeline dot com), Steven Yi. Thanks to Peter Hanappe for Fluidsynth.
